tool.name: VCFrandomSample:
tool.description: Randomly sample sites from VCF dataset

param.name: random_seed
param.label: use this random seed
param.help: -p, --random-seed; use this to make results reproducible

param.name: adv_options_selector
param.label: Advanced controls
param.help: Allows you to specify options that are not listed above

param.name: scale_by
param.label: scale sampling likelihood by this INFO field
param.help: -s, --scale-by; this only works for Float info fields such as AF

tool.help:
Randomly sample sites from an input VCF dataset. Scale the sampling probability by the field specified by --scale-by (see advanced controls). This may be used to provide uniform sampling across allele frequencies, for instance (AF field in this case).
----
Vcfrandomsample @IS_PART_OF_VCFLIB@
